channel.title: Blogs on DB Browser for SQLite
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on DB Browser for SQLite

item.title: Updated our website!
item.description: Experimenting with a new approach for the DB Browser for SQLite website, as the old 1-page website was difficult to expand with blog/info on what we’ve been working on. This new layout - using Hugo and blogdown - should be a decent foundation, and is fairly customisable. It also has many available themes, which we’ll likely experiment with too.
